name: AI-Home
0:
”Alexa, turn on name”
”Alexa, brighten name”
”Alexa, set name to five percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The content of Ai home app includes new user registration, user management, smart home device binding, device management, device control, device linkage settings, scene mode settings and other functions. By scanning the barcode of the device and binding the app with the smart device, the user can control the smart home device in the home by mobile phone, and can customize the smart home scene to make the smart home within reach.
